<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shatter Defenses](/Feats.aspx?ID=385) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 149 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**
A frightened creature is in your melee reach.

</column>

---

Your offense exploits your enemy's fear. Make a melee Strike against a [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creature. If you hit and deal damage, the target becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until its frightened condition ends. If the target was already flat-footed to you when you damaged it with this Strike, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of your next turn.
name: Shatter Defenses
requirement: A frightened creature is in your melee reach.
